description:
The Citizens Commission on Human Rights of Florida (CCHR Florida) is a non-profit organization that investigates and exposes psychiatric violations of human rights. CCHR investigates and exposes cases of abuse in the field of mental health and refers them to the proper agencies. Also helps parents of children with ADHD (Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder) and ADD (Attention Deficit Disorder).

###MON###
###COL###
name: CITIZENS COMMISSION ON HUMAN RIGHTS OF FLORIDA, INC.
